item.title: CentOS Quiz
item.author: mail@richardmillen.com (Richard Millen)
item.description: 1 Which configuration file does the OpenSSH daemon use? Show Answer /etc/ssh/sshd_config function showAnswer(divId) { var x = document.getElementById(divId); if (x.style.display === 'none') { x.style.display = 'block'; } else { x.style.display = 'none'; } } 2 What command is used to start the OpenSSH service? Show Answer /sbin/service sshd start function showAnswer(divId) { var x = document.getElementById(divId); if (x.style.display === 'none') { x.
